title: Surviving the Apocalypse doing the Father's Will
description:
The Apocalyptic Jesus wraps up the Sermon on the Mount. Because of the structure the conclusion relates to the introduction more than people assume. The Introduction is poetic, the conclusion apocalyptic. How to survive the inevitable apocalypse? By doing the will of the Father. This is how Jesus survives the Day of the Lord when it comes to Him. 



Chicago Riots https://youtu.be/U1VdhQbfSTY
Kendell Jenner Live Now Pepsi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Live_for_Now_(Pepsi)
Matthew 7
